page.title: 13HOOK NORTON - TRADE
page.content: The village has the following trades:- a brewery,a thatcher, an educational publisher,5 builders,a second-hand clothes shop,a carpet salesman,a T.V. repair shop,a photographer,a pine furniture maker,a pottery,a knitting group,2 hairdressers as well as the village shops and garages. Central Stores is a typical village shop. It is jam-packed full of exciting things-groceries\stationery\newspapers\ hardware\garden supplies\key-cutting service\dry-cleaning\wools\gifts.You often come out with more than you went in for!. Hook Norton has its own small brewery, owned and managed by the Clarke family with 31 workers. It produces about 95 barrels a day(36 gallons each) The brewery also produces 375 crates of beer for 3 days each week.It takes 10 days for 1 lot to be processed.
